attributes.action: be honest and not manage the country on misleading information, spin and poetic licence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To have a straight PM that stands by his word rather than rely on misleading or inaccurate words to suit the current situation. e.g referendum on euro treaty, stealth taxes, armed forces numbers out of Iraq etc.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
